Title: Provides for dealer sale rescission or cancelation for any vehicle
Summary: Provides for dealer sale rescission or cancelation for any vehicle not later than the thirtieth day following the date of sale; requires return by the dealer to the rightful parties all fees, taxes, and other monies provided to the dealer as part of the sale.
LawCode: Add ยง2124-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to dealer sale rescission or cancelation for any vehicle
